Name: Prospect Inc.
Description:
Unlocked by having the Civilian Militia building at level 10 and the Mining Colony outpost built.

Your Mining Colony now additionally harvests resource fields at 20% per level.

Resource exchange rate lowered by 1.

Effects.VersionSmallDescription: Mining Colony harvests resource fields at <color=green>20%</color> per level

Name: Civic Intelligence
Description:
Unlocked by having the Civilian Militia building at level 10 and a the Habitation Dome outpost built.

Adds 5 spies to your empire.

Lowers the mission requirements for fleets running missions from this station by -20% and the mission escort requirement by 1.

Stargate grants an additional 1 speed."

Name: Gubernatorial Colonial
Description:
Unlocked by having the Merchant House building at level 10 and the Heavy Ship Assembly outpost built.

Fortress claim radius increased by 1.

Name: Trans-Galactic Exports
Description:
Unlocked by having the Communication Array building at level 10 and the Mining Colony outpost built.

Adds 25 freighters to your empire freighter pool and freighters departing from this station have 50% more cargo.

Effects.VersionSmallDescription: <color=green>+50%</color> freighter cargo when departing from this station

Name: WALL Industrial Security
Description:
Unlocked by having the Merchant House building at level 10 and the Habitation Dome outpost built.

Station claim radius increased by 1.

Name: Bellicose Industries
Description:
Unlocked by having the Communications Array building at level 10 and the Heavy Ship Assembly outpost built.

Missile Batteries now harvest resource fields within their radius of influence at 40% yield.

Fleets raiding from this station gain 20% cargo, 1 speed and 10% plunder.

Effects.VersionSmallDescription: <color=green>20%</color> cargo, <color=green>10%</color> plunder and <color=green>1</color> speed whie raiding.
